full_output.summary: Driven and adaptable backend development enthusiast with experience building scalable, high-performance applications using Java and Python. Skilled in optimizing databases and developing service management platforms, I thrive on solving complex technical challenges. Continuously staying updated through resources like Medium, TLDR, and The Kaizen, Im eager to apply my expertise in backend technologies and cloud infrastructure to deliver impactful solutions at Atomic Work.

projects.name: Data Anomaly Detection using Machine Learning
projects.description: Led a team to develop an anomaly detection system utilizing machine learning algorithms such as Isolation Forest and One-Class SVM. Achieved model accuracy of over 95 percent, contributing to the enhancement of data integrity and decision-making processes for business applications. Implemented and optimized various algorithms for efficient detection of irregularities in large datasets.

projects.name: IoT-Based Distance Measurement System
projects.description: Designed and implemented an IoT-based solution using Arduino, IDE, and ultrasonic sensors to measure object distance in real-time. Led the project from ideation to completion, ensuring real-time data accuracy and system scalability for potential business applications. Demonstrated the practical impact of IoT technology in real-world problem-solving by improving operational efficiency.

experiences.description: Developed a load balancer project using Azure Bastion, automating traffic distribution by diverting requests to a virtual server when load exceeded 80 percent, and reverting traffic after optimization. Set up multiple virtual network routers and servers to manage and monitor system load effectively, ensuring seamless traffic management. Upskilled in DevOps technologies through rigorous assignments, gaining hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure and network optimization.

full_output.name: Yuvraj Singh
